system

Class WorkerProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • system.WorkerProxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, java.rmi.Remote, Worker2Master

    public class WorkerProxy
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, Worker2Master
    Represents a thread which is used by the master to talk to workers and vice-versa.
    Author:
    Prakash Chandrasekaran, Gautham Narayanasamy, Vijayaraghavan Subbaiah
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
